scripts.dev: yarn dlx prisma generate && yarn dlx tsc && yarn node dist/BotRoot.js
scripts.start:docker: docker run --detach --name BloxcoBot --network bloxco0 --restart unless-stopped bloxbot:bloxy
scripts.dev:docker: docker build --tag bloxbot:bloxy . && docker run --detach --name BloxcoBot --network bloxco0 --restart unless-stopped bloxbot:bloxy
scripts.stop:docker: docker stop BloxcoBot && docker rm BloxcoBot && docker rmi bloxbot:bloxy
